name: Loopy Wizard
summary:
Control a wizard and make wise use of spells. Can you outsmart the monsters and reach the end?
Spells are placed on the Magic Clock. After each move the clock hand turns and you must make use of the spell it points at.
Enjoy this hectic puzzle game and become a "Loopy Wizard"!

videos.title: Loopy Wizard: A broughlike where you control a wizard and cast deadly spells on monsters & yourself!
